name: Watercress Sauce
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch watercress (reserve 4 to 5 sprigs for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut 2 inches from the stems of the watercress. In a food processor, combine the watercress, egg yolk, lemon juice and salt and pepper. While processing drizzle in the olive oil. Keep sauce cool until serving. Place a dab of sauce aside each quail. Garnish plates with watercress.
